```{r setup, include = FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(
  collapse = TRUE,
  comment = "#>",
  fig.keep = "all"
)
```

```{r}
library(texPreview)
library(slickR)
```

```{r,include=FALSE}
outdir <- file.path(getwd(),"slickr_files/figure-html")

if(!dir.exists(outdir))
  dir.create(outdir,recursive = TRUE)

tex_opts$set(
  fileDir = outdir
)

```

```{r}
tex_opts$set(
  returnType = 'html',
  imgFormat='svg'
  )

```

## Kable Input

```{r testOut}

texPreview::texPreview( obj = knitr::kable(mtcars,'latex'),stem='table1')

```

## TeX Input

```{r testOut2}

tab='
\\begin{tabular}{llr}
\\hline
\\multicolumn{2}{c}{Item} \\\\
\\cline{1-2}
Animal    & Description & Price (\\$) \\\\
\\hline
Gnat      & per gram    & 13.65      \\\\
          & each        & 0.01       \\\\
Gnu       & stuffed     & 92.50      \\\\
Emu       & stuffed     & 33.33      \\\\
Armadillo & frozen      & 8.99       \\\\
\\hline
\\end{tabular}'

texPreview(obj = tab,stem = 'table2')
```

## Carousel [slickR htmlwidget](https://github.com/metrumresearchgroup/slickr)

```{r testOut3}
slickR::slickR(obj = list.files(outdir,full.names = TRUE,pattern = 'svg'),width = '100%')
```
